timeline.event: Galileo Galilei uses a telescope to observe sunspots
STEREO mission launched to study the Sun's solar phenomena
Discovery of Mercury
First exploration by Mariner 10
MESSENGER spacecraft enters Mercury's orbit
Discovery of Venus
First exploration by Venera 1
Venera 9 lands on Venus surface
Formation of Earth
First human spaceflight by Yuri Gagarin
Apollo 11 lands on the Moon
Recognition of the Moon as Earth's satellite
Apollo 11 lands the first humans on the Moon
LCROSS mission confirms water ice in Moon's craters
Discovery of Mars
First flyby by Mariner 4
Viking 1 and 2 land on Mars surface
Curiosity rover lands on Mars
Discovery of Jupiter
First flyby by Pioneer 10
Galileo spacecraft orbits Jupiter
Juno spacecraft enters Jupiter's orbit
Discovery of Saturn
Pioneer 11 flies by Saturn
Cassini-Huygens spacecraft enters Saturn's orbit
Discovery of Uranus by William Herschel
Voyager 2 flies by Uranus
Discovery of Neptune by Urbain Le Verrier
Voyager 2 flies by Neptune
Discovery of Pluto by Clyde Tombaugh
Pluto reclassified as a dwarf planet
New Horizons spacecraft performs a flyby of Pluto
Discovery of Ceres by Giuseppe Piazzi
Dawn spacecraft enters orbit around Ceres
Discovery of Pallas by Heinrich Wilhelm Olbers
Discovery of Juno by Karl Ludwig Harding
Discovery of Vesta by Heinrich Wilhelm Olbers
Dawn spacecraft enters orbit around Vesta
Discovery of Chiron by Charles Kowal
Discovery of Eris by Mike Brown, Chad Trujillo, and David Rabinowitz
